entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow with risk of snow squalls. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light overnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
